home.text: Our team will create for you a memorable vertical video content for social networks that will grab the attention of the audience and help you effectively promote your brand. It's time to make a big statement!

createdVideos.text: Created a video for our clients

socialProof.text: We specialize in creating content for your business that, through social media posting, targeting, will bring you organic reach and increase the credibility of your business!

firstCase.text: A cozy place for original tattoos by experienced tattoo artists with a personal touch.

secondCase.text: Production of stylish and functional coasters of any shape and size for an individual order.

thirdCase.text: A handy tool for finding a partner and developing relationships in the digital age.

moreLang.text: Redefine your brand with our multilingual content. Speak in more than 22 languages, our creatives will create compelling and authentic content that can appeal to a wide audience.

howItWork.text: A few easy steps to take your content to the next level

first.text: Let's get acquainted and dive into your product in more detail, analyze your competitors and advantages

second.text: Implementation of the concept, writing original scripts, making changes

third.text: We're working on the videos, filming and editing them to perfectly match your expectations

priceHeader.includePlus: Everything from the monthly plan, plus:

array: If you test more than 50 creatives per week

bookACall.header: Still in doubt? Learn more about social media content promotion
bookACall.topText: Order a short 15-minute call and we'll be happy to discuss all aspects of our cooperation.
bookACall.bottomText: Our experienced team will be happy to share more information about our services and how we can help your brand achieve outstanding social media results.

footer.textUp: Unique content for your successful social media promotion!
footer.textDown: Creating compelling videos in your own style for all sectors and businesses. Reach your audience on Instagram, Youtube and TikTok with our creative solutions

popup.textDescription: Be the first to know about new vertical content features!

alert.emailAlreadySubscribe: This mail is already subscribed to our updates

subscribeEmail.text: Your email has been verified, subscription activated!

somethingWrongWithEmail.text: The email you entered is invalid. Please check your spelling.
